response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its exceptional features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $12,000. We're confident this investment will pay off in terms of both functionality and satisfaction. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.", "product_price": 12000}
